data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Scarponi, Daniele, Bella, Giano Della, Ceregato, Alessandro (2011): The genus Haedropleura (Neogastropoda, Toxoglossa = Conoidea) in the Plio – Quaternary of the Mediterranean basin. Zootaxa 2796: 37-55, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206562
